channel.title: Smithing
channel.description:
Ok, when I use a runite bar on a anvil, it says
[code]You need a fishing level of 120 to catch manta rays Nothing Interesting Happens[/code]
When i use a addy bar on a anvil, it says
[code]You need a fishing level of 120 to catch manta rays[/code] and opens the smithing interface or frame or whatever for adamant smithing
All of the rest are good, why is it doing this. Did i not close something, anyone help??[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 10:18:45 PM[/size][hr]Your kidding me, someone has to know this. Ironicly i posted this same post on my last question.

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

[quote=“pmgz2, post:6, topic:112250”]the correct ones:

[code] else if(useItemID == 2349 && atObjectID == 2783)//bronze
{
initSmithing(2349);
flushOutStream();
}

			else if(useItemID == 2351 && atObjectID == 2783)//iron
			{
				initSmithing(2351);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2353 && atObjectID == 2783)//steel

			{
				initSmithing(2353);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2359 && atObjectID == 2783)//mith
			{
				initSmithing(2359);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2361 && atObjectID == 2783)//addy
			{
				initSmithing(2361);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			else if(useItemID == 2363 && atObjectID == 2783)//rune
			{
				initSmithing(2363);
				flushOutStream();
			}[/code]

the only reason you get those messages are because u hv a harpoon or something in the first slot, otherwise those messages shouldn’t come up. unless u r at varrock fountain…[/quote]
So your saying if i replace my whole code with that one, it’ll work
PS: I don’t need the fishing stuff in it.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 11:22:43 PM[/size][hr]Had to figure it out on my own. But tyvm you gave me a idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

the correct ones:

[code] else if(useItemID == 2349 && atObjectID == 2783)//bronze
{
initSmithing(2349);
flushOutStream();
}

			else if(useItemID == 2351 && atObjectID == 2783)//iron
			{
				initSmithing(2351);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2353 && atObjectID == 2783)//steel

			{
				initSmithing(2353);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2359 && atObjectID == 2783)//mith
			{
				initSmithing(2359);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 2361 && atObjectID == 2783)//addy
			{
				initSmithing(2361);
				flushOutStream();
			}
			else if(useItemID == 2363 && atObjectID == 2783)//rune
			{
				initSmithing(2363);
				flushOutStream();
			}[/code]

the only reason you get those messages are because u hv a harpoon or something in the first slot, otherwise those messages shouldn’t come up. unless u r at varrock fountain…

Read full topic

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

i find that hilarious lol im lyk Lol’ing.

What taylor said though look for that item id on the anvil. change up the send messages, replace them to say what their suppose to say, not fishing crap.

item.title: Smithing
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

This is what i found

[code] if (playerLevel[10] <= 59)
{
sendMessage(“You need to be lvl 60 fishing to catch lobster.”);
}
else
{
lob();
}
}

			else if (carb == 12603)	//varrock Founation X=3240,3435 //item big net slot 1
			{
				carb();
			}
			else if (turtle == 12706)	//Well X=2651,3370 //item lobby pot slot 1
                            {
                            if (playerLevel[10] <= 98)
                            {
                            sendMessage("You need to be lvl 99 fishing to catch sea turtle.");
                            }
                            else
			{
				turtle();
			}
                            }
			else if (manta == 12716)	//Well X=2651,3370 //item harpoon slot 1
                            {
                            if (playerLevel[10] <= 119)
                            {
                            sendMessage("You need to be lvl 120 fishing to catch manta rays.");
                            }
                            else
			{
				manta();
			}
                            }
		        else if(useItemID == 436 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			tin();
			}
			
			/*else if(useItemID == 453 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666))
			{
			steel(itemSlot);
			}*/
			
			else if(useItemID == 438 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))

			{
			Copper();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 293 && (atObjectX == 3028 && atObjectY == 3356)) {
			if (absY == 3355) {
				teleportToX = absX;
				teleportToY = (absY + 2);
			}
			else
			{
				teleportToX = 3028;
				teleportToY = 3355;
			}
	}
	if (useItemID == 293 && (atObjectX == 3268 && atObjectY == 3435)) { // black drAGON CAVE
		teleportToX = 3255;
		teleportToY = 9581;
		sendMessage("No turning back now");

}

			else if(useItemID == 440 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			iron();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 442 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			silver2();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 444 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			gold();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 447 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			mith();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 449 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			adam();
			}
			
			else if(useItemID == 451 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666 || atObjectID == 9390))
			{
			rune();
			}[/code]

Read full topic
